By agreeing to the terms and services i accept the following: 
 - You agree to store your information on our systems

data-processing: To make our services work for you we process your data. We process the data you provide to us
data-protection: To comply with the data regulations we protect your data by encrypting, hashing and use access management policies to restrict access
